attributes.action: stop errors on bills - get Darling to be a darlin' on calculations and eradicate inaccuracies - make sure utility companies are utilised properly - pay the poor, not make the poor pay !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
